name: Astronaut
description: With Astronaut, you can rely on actionable, data-backed recommendations to build a thriving community that provides value for your members and your brand.
features: Insight reports for data driven decsions
Headline: The AI Assistant for Community Managers.
ShortDescription: Astronaut helps you understand your community’s sentiment, suggests engagement strategies, and surfaces insights.

Highlights.name: Uncover Hidden Meanings
Highlights.description: Astronaut goes beyond basic metrics with sentiment analysis, helping you understand the emotions behind your online community.

Highlights.name: Track What Matters Most
Highlights.description: Customize what you track with Astronaut's filters, focusing on the KPIs that matter most to your business

Highlights.name: Foster Friendly Competition
Highlights.description: Create leaderboards within your community to motivate engagement and highlight top contributors.

enhanced_description: Astronaut is an AI Assistant for Community Managers designed to help build and manage thriving online communities. It goes beyond basic metrics by leveraging sentiment analysis to uncover hidden meanings and emotions within community discussions. The platform provides actionable, data-backed recommendations and personalized insights to suggest engagement strategies, track custom KPIs, and surface comprehensive insight reports for data-driven decisions. Key functionalities include identifying top contributors, facilitating community feedback, and fostering engagement through features like leaderboards, ultimately providing value for both community members and the brand.
key_use_cases: Building and nurturing thriving online communities
Understanding and analyzing community sentiment and emotions
Generating data-backed recommendations for community engagement
Tracking and reporting on key performance indicators (KPIs) related to community health and activity
Identifying and recognizing top community contributors
Improving employee engagement through community feedback and strategies
Gaining insights for talent management and employee happiness
Developing strategies for diversity metrics within the community context
competitive_advantages: Goes beyond basic metrics with advanced sentiment analysis to understand emotions
Leverages AI as an assistant for community managers
Offers personalized insights tailored to community needs
Enables customized tracking of relevant KPIs with filters
Features leaderboards to foster friendly competition and motivate engagement
roi_benefits: Builds a thriving community that provides value for members and brand
Enables data-driven decisions through actionable insights and reports
Improves community engagement through suggested strategies and motivational features
Enhances understanding of community sentiment to address issues proactively
Increases overall community activity and participation by highlighting top contributors
primary_users: HR Professionals (focused on employee engagement and talent management)
